summary: Shyvana the Half Dragon from League of Legends, a true dragonborn.. just for fun
descriptionHtml:
Shyvana a true dragonborn character...

Made her form the Shyvana champion from League of Legends, full with all her abilities saved on the favorites  even including turning into a dragon. This is made possible by the following mods that are necessary to play:

 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/108232 ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/68931  Extended Slider Colors by Expired
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/104348 Battle Claws by Loshirai14
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/76195  Armor Compilation by Omegared99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/75647  Flyable Dragon Races REVAMPED by ElSte17
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/106555 LiFE - by LithiumFlower

credit go\'s to the mod authors  

installation: 
1 install all the mods 
2 place Save99-Shyvana Skyrim 00.45.42.ess into Libraries/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves
3 start game and load the game 
4 have fun
author: GDIGE
